Class: Charset

Charset

Charset provides character set encoding and decoding for JavaScript.

new Charset()

Charset is an abstract super class for all character set encoders and decoders.
Source:
  • Amqp-0-9-1-debug.js, line 2305

Methods

decode(buf) → {String}

Decodes a ByteBuffer into a String. Bytes for partial characters remain in the ByteBuffer after decode has completed.
Parameters:
Name Type Description
buf ByteBuffer the ByteBuffer to decode
